page.title: 07Other Features(contd.).
page.content: The most notable {Pig Farm}in this area is visited by interested farmers from all over the world.The owner is the only Super Nucleus Herd Breeder in Scotland, breeding Large Whites and Landrace pigs.The boar and the sow are carefully chosen to produce a good litter, and often artificial insemination is used. {Manor House} This establishment,previously known as Turin House, is a{residential home}for the elderly.It is staffed mainly by local people, plus some from neighbouring towns.The house is set in its own grounds and there is the possibility that it may become a Nursing Home as professional staff is found.
